Description.Text: This is an excellent product highly recommended with a top of the range Health Spa. (01/09 LP)
The hotel is located on the Riverbank, in proximity of Waterloo.

All executive rooms are large in size and decorated to a very high standard. All are is exceptional conditions and feature almost up to date facilities. The bathrooms are large in size and in exceptional condition.
This is a purpose built impressive hotel.
The stylish French brasserie restaurant on the ground floor offers a large variety of dishes influenced by Japanese and Californian flavours.
The large lobby is modern in style and pleasantly decorated.
